resources.string: Delete an item by pressing it long. \nYou can make an item green by pressing it.
If you have any question or cool ideas feel free to contact me at: todo.app.infomail@gmail.com\n
You can open a list by pressing on it.\n
You can delete a list by pressing on:
A popup will appear and pres yes to delete it.\n
You can edit a list by long pressing on the text, a popup will appear wear you can change the text.\n
You can delete an item by pressing on:
A popup will appear and pres yes to delete it.\n
You can set an item done by pressing on the checkbox.\n
You can delete the entire page by pressing \'CLEAR THIS LIST\' at the botten of the screen.\n
You can edit an item by long pressing the text.
